title: Introducing: biLLLy
content:
EDIT: Scratch this, BiLLLy plays in Hawkon’s live band, the two are separate artists.

A rather bizarre artist to choose for an introducing article in truth, given that it appears he’s perhaps already moved onto a new project, yet biLLLy’s three debut tracks, released last year, are too good not to mention. BiLLLy (aka Billy Paul Brooks) also plays live with Hawkon, a project that gained a decent level of blog exposure in the second half of 2014, yet if I’m completely honest, Finally Out There EP, his only biLLLy EP, excites me more than anything by Hawkon. Like a more vocal dd elle, it’s upbeat, laidback and just downright enjoyable; none of the vanity that has a tendency to creep into some of these more ‘serious’ projects. So it feels very Jai Paul influenced, but hey, there’s worse influences to have. Check out all three tracks below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
